posts.raw_content: Just stopped by local post office and asked why flag was not at half mast.   Asked to speak to Post Master.  They sent out a custodian who stated that he's not lowering the flag for Charlie. I informed him of the president's decree and he told me that Trump is my presdient, not his.  I informed him he is a federal employee and the decision is not for him to decide.  He replied 'It's not coming down.    This has been reported. Tried contacting Post Master.  Staff tells me they are not there.  Contacted Post Master General's office and made an Official complaint.
